Headline: Update: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 69th/Bell
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses temp. rerouted WB: 69th, Damen, Marquette and Western; EB: Marquette, California, 71st, Western, Marquette, Damen, and 69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 69th/Bell due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 69th, Damen, Marquette and Western.

Eastbound buses will operate via Marquette, California, 71st, Western, Marquette, Damen, and 69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near 69th/Bell
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Marquette and Western due to street blockage near 69th/Bell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Marquette and Western due to street blockage near 69th/Bell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemont
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Jefferson Park and O'Hare. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #56 Milwaukee bus or the #88 Higgins bus.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
